children.value: You can provide custom pagination buttons.
You can pass a function that returns a react element,
({ pages, activePage, onClick }) =>  {/* return your element here */}
Is the hook to the inner
. You can attach it wherever you want within the returned component.

<Playground >
    <Carousel 
        itemsToShow={3}
        renderPagination={
            ({pages, activePage, onClick}) => {
                return (
                    <Flex direction="row">
                        {
                            pages.map((page) => {
                                const isActivePage = activePage === page;
                                return (
                                    <Square key={page} onClick={() => onClick(page)} active={isActivePage}/>
                                )
                        })}
                    </Flex>
                )
        }}
    >
        <Item>1</Item>
        <Item>2</Item>
        <Item>3</Item>
        <Item>4</Item>
        <Item>5</Item>
        <Item>6</Item>
        <Item>7</Item>
        <Item>8</Item>
        <Item>9</Item>
        <Item>10</Item>
    </Carousel>
</Playground>
